item.title: Blinking interface [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, in my castle wars minigame, the interface blinks in the waiting room saying how much longer it has left until the game starts. It blinks, waits 3 seconds, blinks again, and keeps doing that. I’ve followed another tutorial on how to fix it but it didn’t seem to work. This is the thing in my castlewars.java making it show up.

public static void updatePlayers() { Iterator iterator = waitingRoom.keySet().iterator(); while (iterator.hasNext()) { Client player = (Client) iterator.next(); if (player != null) { player.getPA().sendFrame126( "Next Game Begins In:@red@ "+ ((gameStartTimer * 3) + (timeRemaining * 3)) + "@whi@seconds.", 6570); player.getPA().sendFrame126( "Zamorak Players: @red@" + getZammyPlayers() + "@whi@.", 6572); player.getPA().sendFrame126( "Saradomin Players: @red@" + getSaraPlayers() + "@whi@.", 6664); player.getPA().walkableInterface(6673); } } }

Can anybody please help me

Read full topic
